participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Alex is enthusiastic and enjoys expressing herself through dance and her love for dogs. She is down-to-earth and values her hobbies over material things.
participant_1.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i dance on the weekends. i don't care about fashion. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i hate the color orange.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Jordan is creative and has a passion for poetry and Star Wars. He is sociable, enjoys trying new things, and values physical activity.
participant_2.background: i enjoy poetry. i'm a huge star wars fan. i try various coffees as a hobby. i played football for a division a college.

she liked it   i like dancing and drinking coffee more though
